headline.main: AXIS ADMITS FOE IS DEEP IN LIBYA; British Column Advances 200 Miles, Skirting Area Where Chief Battle Is Raging

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 24 -- The British forces in Libya have suffered heavy losses in battles that have been raging without pause in the quadrangle formed By Tobruk, Bir el-Gobi, Sidi Omar and Solum, today's communique said. The bulletin acknowledged that the Italian Savona Division, in the Solum region on the Libyan-Egyptian frontier, was "strongly engaged."
